name: Binary System
description:
Take control of a binary planetary system, collecting stars while avoiding asteroids. Lose one planet, lose them both.

View this game on the Ludum Dare website

Controls
Left/Right or A/D to rotate the planets
Up/Down or W/S to move the planets vertically

* Please note: these are the standalone versions and do not have leaderboard support. A Unity webplayer version with leaderboards is available on GameJolt
